content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (40.5, -80.5) and (42.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -46.5), and (-14.5, -45.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -48.5) and (-12.5, -49.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from chests
- Ensure that the target chest contains the items you wish to extract. Verify the chest's inventory before attempting to move items.

### Errors when transferring iron ore to furnaces
- Confirm that the furnaces have available space and are not full. Ensure that the furnaces are ready to receive iron ore before attempting to transfer.

### Errors when moving items from mining drill drop positions
- Check that the chests at the drop positions are not full. Empty the chests regularly to prevent mining operations from halting.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
